definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: complete, perfect (NH comprehend, include, Pi. complete, [[כְּלָל]] a general rule, [[בִּכְלָל]] in general; BAram. And Syr. Shaph. [[שׁכלל]], 4aklel complete, finish; As. kalâli III. I. 2. complete; Ar. kal=a is be wearied, fatigued; Aram. [[כְּלִילָא]], kliylo0 is a crown, hence den. [[אַכְלֵיל]], kalal to crown; Eth. I. 2 kalala: to crown, 0aklil: a crown, taklil: crowning (of bride), nuptials; Ar. 0’ikliyl a crown, loan-word (Frä:62)):—Ez Eze 27:4 [[בּׂנַיִח כָּֽלְלוּ יׇפְיֵח]] thy builders have perfected thy beauty (of Tyre, under fig. of ship), v:Eze 27:11.
